content:
@Lisa Nelson @Lloyd McKenzie @Abigail Watson On this Thursday's call @Debi Willis and I are chairing), but our most experienced co-chair (@Virginia Lorenzi) will be missing and I may not be able to get present for the start of the call. We want to push through to get the charter document finalized, and we need some HL7-savvy experienced eyeballs to help with questions such as:

  • Are we finished? i.e. is this already a great charter?
  • Does each bullet in the draft charter need to talk explicitly about word products & contributions?
  • For the few remaining comments in that google doc, what's needed vs "nice-to-have", given that charters get updated anyway as time goes by?

So we hope you'll be there on the call :-)
I'll be on the call. Short answer to all of your questions is "no hard and fast rules" - key is that we have something that the group itself is happy with.
